title: Getting forcibly removed from lobby for not picking a champion while it isn't your turn to pick
body: So as the title as says, I was removed from a lobby (and punished) for not picking a champion even though it was not my turn to pick (it was also in ranked) and I was wondering if their is any reason this happens. {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
The exact message is "You have been removed from the lobby because a player failed to select a champion." That does not mean **you** didn't select the champion, it's just that *someone* in the lobby failed to. This same message also appears if someone queue dodges.

Now, by this logic, you should *not* be punished, but you claim that you are. Have you attempted running custom games to make sure you can replicate this glitch?
